mapper.insert: insert into t_store( storeLoginName, storePwd, name, address, tel, hours, leastMoney, fee, notice, avgSendTime, openOrClose, monthSell, star ) values( #{storeLoginName}, #{storePwd}, #{name}, #{address}, #{tel}, #{hours}, #{leastMoney}, #{fee}, #{notice}, #{avgSendTime}, #{openOrClose}, #{monthSell}, #{star} )
mapper.update: update t_store set name = #{name}, address = #{address}, tel = #{tel}, hours = #{hours}, leastMoney = #{leastMoney}, fee = #{fee}, notice = #{notice} where id = #{id}
